ygData.subject: Re: /loc
ygData.msgSnippet: Aye, dieding near the road is the easiest wayto find ur corpse. Or get a bard. It bascially zoom in to ur corpse. ... From: Wilson To: EQS Sent: Thursday,
ygData.messageBody:
Aye, dieding near the road is the easiest wayto find ur corpse. Or get a bard. It bascially zoom in to ur corpse.
----- Original Message -----
From: Wilson
To: EQS
Sent: Thursday, April 29, 1999 00:07
Subject: [sg-everquest] /loc


This was regarding the question what Gary asked?

Use /loc to get the corpse coordinates. Then if you have a compass, you will be able to get to the body easily ;-) Where to get the compass? Near the wharf at Qeynos, around Mermaid's Lure.

Usually if I know I'm gonna die, I will just run to the nearest road path and fight til my last. So when retrieving, I'd just run along the main road and will sure be able to stumble upon it ;-)

Cheers,
Wilson
